info.title: @digipair/skill-web-ocr
info.description: This skill uses OCR technology to analyze images and extract text, enabling automatic data entry.

post.summary: Extract text from an image in the DOM
post.description: Element for retrieving text from an image present in the DOM

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: CSS selector of the image present in the DOM

parameters.name: language
parameters.summary: Language of the text to extract
parameters.description: Language of the text to extract

parameters.name: required
parameters.description: When the field is required, the boost cannot be executed until a value has been entered

post.description: Element for extracting text from an image provided by the user

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the text to extract

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Text displayed to the user to guide them in their input

parameters.name: required
parameters.description: Fields required to execute the boost
